title: Investors warn of 'rot in private equity' as funds come up with circular deals

summary: Foreign investors have preferred global markets over India in 2025, while domestic liquidity has driven mid- and smallcap inflows. With limited capex triggers and slow credit growth, 2026 may test retail money. A valuation-led consolidation could bring FPIs back, making large caps the safer allocation for equity portfolios.

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Dec 26: HFCL, Coforge, Reliance Power, Dixon Tech, JBM Auto, NCC among top losers
summary: The Indian stock market suffered heavy losses on December 26, with IT and auto sectors leading the decline. The Nifty 50 fell 0.39% and the Sensex dropped 0.44%. Broader markets also closed lower, while only metals and consumer durables gained.

title: Sensex falls 367 points, Nifty 50 ends below 26,050— 10 key highlights from the Indian stock market today
summary: The Sensex ended with a loss of 367 points, or 0.43%, at 85,041.45, while the Nifty 50 settled at 26,042.30, down 100 points, or 0.38%. The BSE Midcap index slipped by 0.18% while the Smallcap index dropped 0.34%.

title: How much gold without an invoice can't be seized during an income tax raid?
summary: Taxpayers should be aware that only the weight of gold, not its rate, matters for declarations

title: Silver prices zoom over 165% in a year: Does it signal euphoria or are gains sustainable?
summary: Silver prices jumped nearly 5% and crossed $75 per mark for the first time as expectations for more US rate cuts and rising geopolitical tensions powered precious metals. Back home, silver futures on MCX rose 4% to a record high above  ₹2,33,000 per kilogram.

title: EPW India IPO Allotment today: Latest GMP, steps-by-step guide to check allotment status online for SME IPO
summary: EPW India IPO was subscribed 1.32x, raising  ₹31.81 crore. The company plans to use the funds for operational support and debt repayment. The allotment status will be available on December 26, with listings on December 30.

title: Paras Defence share price jumps over 4% after this update on divestment in subsidiary company. Details here
summary: Paras Defence informed exchanges that the company had proposed to divest its 58.02% equity stake in Ayatti Innovative, comprising 15,20,000 equity shares of face value of  ₹10 each.

title: Mint Explainer | Why Vodafone Idea’s AGR relief won’t solve its survival challenge
summary: Even if the government halves AGR dues, spectrum debt, low Arpu, and funding needs mean the telecom operator’s long-term viability remains uncertain.

title: 2025 mutual fund scorecard: Top performers, laggards, and key surprises
summary: In 2025, equity performance varied significantly with silver funds leading at 128% returns. Large and midcap funds excelled due to quality stock selection, while smallcap funds struggled.&nbsp;

title: Market Wrap: Sensex slides 367 pts, Nifty slips below 26,050 as year-end profit-taking caps weekly gains
summary: The BSE Sensex fell 367 points, or 0.4%, to end at 85,041.45, while the NSE Nifty 50 declined 0.4% to 26,042.3, slipping below the 26,050 mark. On the 30-stock Sensex, shares of Bajaj Finance, Asian Paints, Eternal, Sun Pharma and Tech Mahindra were among the biggest drags, each falling between 1% and 1.5%. Friday’s decline pared weekly gains for the benchmark indices. The Nifty 50 rose 0.3% for the week, while the Sensex added 0.1%, snapping a three-week losing streak.

title: Binance affiliate Trust Wallet hacked, $7 million affected; investigation underway – what should impacted users do?
summary: Trust Wallet users lost over $7 million due to a security issue in version 2.68 of its Chrome extension. The company plans to reimburse affected users.

title: Tata Steel faces €1.4 Billion class action lawsuit in the Netherlands for environment, health-related damages
summary: A non-profit claims emissions have harmed public health and property values. Tata Steel denies the allegations and plans to defend itself legally while emphasizing its commitment to environmental protection.

title: Star label changes, tax relief to chart course for AC prices
summary: As India prepares for stricter energy efficiency norms in 2026, air conditioner prices are expected to rise. However, GST reductions may offset these increases. Market forecasts indicate potential short-term demand revival and a 10-15% decline in AC volumes for FY2026.

title: Larry Ellison, Not Elon Musk, Was The Tech Titan Who Defined 2025
summary: When the year began, a billionaire with close ties to the White House was a lock for the most newsworthy tech titan of 2025. But 12 chaotic months later, Larry Ellison, not Elon Musk, can justifiably lay claim to the title.

title: Aadhaar-PAN linking mandatory by 31 December 2025 – here's a last-minute guide for taxpayers
summary: Taxpayers must link Aadhaar with PAN by 31 December 2025 to maintain PAN validity. The process can be completed online, requiring a valid PAN, Aadhaar number, and mobile number.&nbsp;

title: Personal loan cooling-off period explained: Bank-wise cancellation charges
summary: Banks usually allow borrowers to cancel their personal loans, if required, during the cooling-off period with no or low charges.&nbsp;
